column1: Increased levels of the canalicular ATP transporters, P - glycoprotein, multidrug resistance - associated protein 2 ( Mrp2), and bile salt export pump ( Bsep) at week 2 ( P < 0. 05), unchanged levels of Ntcp, Oatp1a1, Oatp1a4, and Mct2, but decreased levels of cytochrome P450 3a2 ( Cyp3a2) and glutathione S - transferase ( Gst4 - 4) at week 4 ( P < 0. 05) were observed in peritumor vs. sham - operated liver tissues with Western blotting.
